weloveclouds.server.services.datastore

Interface IDataAccessService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IMovableDataAccessService, IReplicableDataAccessService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataAccessService, KVCache, KVPersistentStorage, MovableDataAccessService, MovablePersistentStorage, ReplicableDataAccessService, SimulatedMovableDataAccessService

    public interface IDataAccessService
    A common interface for the data access layer through which key-value pairs can be stored on the serer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String key)
      Gets the respective value for the referred key from the storage.
      PutType putEntry(KVEntry entry)
      Insert or update a key-value pair in the storage.
      void removeEntry(java.lang.String key)
      Removes the respective key along with the stored value from the storage

    • Method Detail

      • putEntry

        PutType putEntry(KVEntry entry)
          throws StorageException
        Insert or update a key-value pair in the storage.
        Parameters:
        entry - that contains the key and the value
        Returns:
        PutType.INSERT} if key was stored for the first time in the storage, or a PutType.UPDATE if the key was already stored
        Throws:
        StorageException - if any error occurs

      • getValue

        java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String key)
                   throws StorageException,
                          ValueNotFoundException
        Gets the respective value for the referred key from the storage.
        Throws:
        StorageException - if any error occurs
        ValueNotFoundException - if the key was not stored in the storage yet

      • removeEntry

        void removeEntry(java.lang.String key)
          throws StorageException
        Removes the respective key along with the stored value from the storage
        Throws:
        StorageException - if any error occurs
